Review.Titre: I have not received my batteries yet
Review.Contenu: I have not received my batteries yet. They said they were delivered on the ninth

Review.Titre: Not sure any humans actually work here
Review.Contenu: After placing my order, a coworker asked me to make a change to it. I had only placed it hours before, so I did not think it would be an issue. There was no clear way on the website to make an alteration to the order. No big deal, I'll just call them on the phone and explain the situation.... For the rest of the day and the following day I attempted to get in touch with someone who worked there, calling multiple times, but was always kicked to voicemail. I did receive the product quickly, so they at least deserve the one star for that, but zero customer service, will not order from them again.

Review.Titre: I ordered a battery for my flashlight…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a battery for my flashlight and was sent the incorrect battery…I emailed your Company and they will not do a refund…battery was only over 5$. They are saying it was my fault for the incorrect battery ordered…if I return it would cost me more on shipping that the battery itself. This is rediculas on there part.

Review.Titre: I placed my order on the 17th and now…
Review.Contenu: I placed my order on the 17th and now it's  23 rd and still no batteries. Why send USPS. They are the worst and ups is the best. if I don't receive them tomorrow I shall cancel the order.I should have ordered from Amazon,I would have had the batteries days ago.Jim Watson

Review.Titre: You sent me the wrong batteries.
Review.Contenu: You sent different batteries than I ordered.I ordered Tenergy NiCd Sub C 2200mAh 1.2V Paper Wrapped Rechargeable Battery (Flat Top) with tabs.I received Tenergy ICR18650-2600 3.7V 2600MAH 9.6/wh. These are too long and wrong voltage for my application.  The only thing right was the tabs. Delivery was on time.  These won't fit my application.Order # 156627, SKU 20305-1

Do you want me to rate you I never received the product yet you should least check to make sure that it’s been sent out before you asked somebody to give you a rating? the reason you got one star is because you’re not checking to see if your product even got to its destination you could let me know when you sent it out that will get you two stars

Review.Titre: The item I ordered has free shipping…
Review.Contenu: The item I ordered has free shipping when I added 2button battery cards and went to shipping I found shipping charges were added, I tried 3 times to get free shipping on my entire order when additional shipping was added I cancelled the additional items. So we both lost out. This was the black friday deal. Thank you Ron Wagner
20 dollars shipping for 2 little cables? If I could have found another source I would have. Based on this horrible experience never again and no positive referral. Thanks for gouging America!

Review.Titre: The tracking app is a Joke !
Review.Contenu: I used your tracking app and once it arrived at a UPS customer service hub it sat for 3 days and when I called requesting to pick it up before being transferred to USPS instead of just being delivered to my address I was told I couldn’t change the process. UPS wanted $8 and Tenergy to call and ask for it to be held and wouldn't let me come pick it up. Tenergy refused to make the call, I’m not impressed and would prefer that I be able to pick up MY purchased items given the fact that it’s already been 5days and will now be 8. I won’t be ordering anything further and so a zero you will get.Thanks !

Retroactively canceled a valid coupon. I ordered over $500 worth of stuff online and applied a coupon code for free delivery. The coupon did work and I did not have to pay for shipping, but then a few days later they contacted me and told me that I would have to pay for shipping. Worst customer service ever.

We are tax exempt, so we needed to fill out your form in order to move forward.  We filled it out and emailed it back on 11/16. I reached out on 12/6 asking the status of our order and was told you never received the requested form, which at that time I RESENT the original email along with the filled out form.  No apology, nothing!! And then the nerve of whoever called for payment said AGAIN they never received the form! I have asked the teacher to never use you as a vendor in the future.

It wasn’t your company, it’s the post office. The product was shipped on May 17 and it’s May 25th and I still didn’t receive it. The tracking looks like it left Fremont ,CA came to Harrisburg, PA and then back to Lancaster, CA.

Review.Titre: Ordering and searching was great but…
Review.Contenu: Ordering and searching was great but forcing someone to sign up to track there  order just seems over the top to me

Lousy company.  Lies, nothing but lies.Tenergy’s response has nothing to do with the batteries not working.

Review.Titre: One out of four packs is bad.
Review.Contenu: I purchased 4 packs on June 29th.  One was bad.  I have been quizzed about the way I charged and tested the packs.  Three of the packs work as they should.  The 4th will not take a charge.  I have been in contact with your service team... "Alex T.".  After 2 emails detailing the problem, he now wants me to try the bad pack in an application.  I won't be a customer again.

Review.Titre: I purchased a new battery pack from…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a new battery pack from you. It has an issue and I emailed you. You have not responded. Is this the way that you treat your customers?

70mm does not equal 65mm.You failed to provide physical dimensions in the "specifications".If you're not going to adhere to form factor 18650 standards, then that must be stated somewhere in the product description.Your "FAQ" button produces zero response.Your shipping information and review web pages need to support all web browsers, not just a select few.I need to know your product return procedure.

Review.Titre: Do not purchase anything from this…
Review.Contenu: Do not purchase anything from this company through Amazon. My husband did and got screwed over twice. Then when he used the card that came in the package from Tenergy the basically called him a liar because he wrote them the same day as Amazon answered his return request. Even though in the end we ended up with 4 working D Rechargeable Batteries we had originally ordered 12. Purchase from EBL, they care about their customers. After I told them what Tenergy had done they gave us 50% off our order and it came within 2 days and was exactly what we had ordered.

Review.Titre: Fedex delivered to the wrong address
Review.Contenu: Fedex delivered to the wrong address. Luckily I had my garage door opened when the truck passed by. I heard the trucks sliding door. I checked online and it showed it was delivered to my address at 10:57 am.Nothing on my porch. I had to go look for it. What the hell is wrong with Fedex. I will be looking for another source for my batteries and solar equipment. Have a nice day. Get someone else but Fedex, they are not doing a good job.

Sadly to say the product has been in transit for 12 days and it is now past Easter. What else is there to say as the shipping time from the company did not indicate this length of time to deliver. I will review the product when it arrives.

Review.Titre: Well tried to cancel my order on a few…
Review.Contenu: Well tried to cancel my order on a few occasions,  I call the next morning from when I placed my order inquiring about how long it will take to ship it out? They 5 to 7 days because it needed to be built.   Text back the same day to cancel it could wait that 5 to 7 the said it to later to cancel to was shipped out?  Texted  back on status of shipping because my in Status say it still being in process of being filled. Confused anyways, the person texted back confirmed that hasn’t shipped yet? So at this point just not worth loosing anymore time with trying to canceling order !

Review.Titre: I just installed the last 4 batteries…
Review.Contenu: I just installed the last 4 batteries of my last shipment to find that they are only at 30%, not 100%.  Even the other cameras are only at 30% - 47%.  The original batteries lasted a few months, these are only good for a few weeks.  I am hoping that the white ones that I just ordered are better than the blue ones I recently purchased. Too expensive to keep changing 6 Arlo cameras.

The THREE battery chargers and FOURTY EIGHT NIMH batteries I purchased overheated while charging and now the batteries have no capacity at all. I contacted Tenergy for return & replacement right away and they said NO. I then filed a dispute and Tenergy got my BANK account closed. FIVE days without being able to buy groceries, (thanks Fifth Third). SO DON'T BUY!!

Contacted about charger issue right after I purchased batteries and charger.  Took a month to get an answer, I was informed that they were the only Arlo rechargeable battery sellers.  Not true,  I test three others on amazon and much better products.  There was no action taken on their part just had to eat the product.  Now a few months later and charge is not working at all.  They will not even answer my emails.

Review.Titre: I haven't rec'd my package yet
Review.Contenu: I haven't rec'd my package yet, I called Tenergy for help they sent me to UPS.  My package has been in limbo since the 8th of April.  Apparently it's out for delivery as we speak, then I go check and it says it my incorrect apartment address.  I live in a house.  It says it is trying to locate my address, I can't get thru to UPS, 25 min wait at least.  So infuriating. I wish I never placed the order.Caroline

They are now charging but the camera is not in use and it is a safety issue in our house.

No indication as to when I should expect my order to be delivered. No tracking information. Nothing! Crickets!

As of today Dec.8, check USPS Tracking, shipment never left facility and picked up by USPS.Would never purchase from this company again. I want a full refund and will be filing a complaint with the California Attorney General Consumer Fraud and also U.S. Interstate Commerce and the Controller of Currency.

Review.Titre: Don’t expect your package 2nd day by…

Only because amazon said they couldn’t get me the brand I wanted for 5 days. I shoulda just bought the other from amazon. I knew it was to good as well..

IF had actually been fedex or usps instead of ups, I probably would’ve had it BEFORE Christmas. If it is NOT here by 12/27, like ups says it will be, I will be refusing the order and requesting refund! This kind of customer service is totally unacceptable!

Review.Contenu: Last 2 orders I have gotten 4 batteries for arlo camera, both of those orders one of the batteries died and wouldn't hold a charge after 2 or 3 charges ,so I'm trying one more time with this order ,if happens again I'm done with the company.

What I received were ancient technology chargers that were at least ten years old and two of the three arrived scratched and dented.When I contacted All Battery they demanded I send pictures, I did. I have heard nothing from them since. Unless you have more money than sense, shop elsewhere.

Review.Titre: I have called and sent many emails to…

Ordered May 10th. Contacted me on May 11th, about shipping and billing address mismatched.  Called and sent e-mails confirming address.  Called again on May 19th, was told it was their mistake, would ship that day.  Called on May 20th, and again told it was made and shipped, would send tracking number.  No number came.  Called again on May 21st, told it had shipped, would send tracking number.  No number came.  Finally received tracking number on May 24th, confirmed it was picked up on the 21st.  Poor response time, did not follow through on order in a timely manner, and basically made up shipping information when it was clearly not correct.  Will not order again.

Thefirst battery they sent didnt work and then they sent another battery to replace it. the other battery was too long for my gun wen i tried using it it butned the connector cable in my gun . Now my gun doesnt work at all. Id give 0 stars if i could...waste of time and money

I was dismayed by All-Battery's inability to provide an estimate of the shipping and customs fees for shipping their product to Canada.  The calculation of the product value for canadian takes was inflated by All-Battery's shipping fees. All-Battery ships via UPS which added a broker's fee that was equal to the total inflated customs fees.  The final cost was an additional 85% of the cost of the product itself. I will NEVER USE ALL-BATTERY AGAIN  to ship to our canadian location.  If I had known the TOTAL or ESTIMATED cost, I would NOT have used their service.

Review.Titre: I asked for my order to be canceled…
Review.Contenu: I asked for my order to be canceled before it was shipped. Instead I did not receive an answer to my request until my order was shipped. So they answered my request to cancel after my order was shipped not before. Very sneaky and underhanded

Review.Titre: Very lengthy turn-around time... Yet high cost shipping charges!
Review.Contenu: Ordered on 9/5.  Paid almost $16 for shipping.  Yet merchandise is not expected to arrive until at least 9/16.  Many retailers offer free shipping and the goods are delivered in 3 to 5 days.  Not impressed with the value proposition offered by All-Battery at this point.

Review.Titre: Company is quick to charge, slow to refund
Review.Contenu: I ordered from the company on 26 Dec; they charged my credit card on 28 Dec, even though they hadn't shipped my order yet. On 30 Dec they sent me notification that they had cancelled my order. No credit has shown up on my credit card account as of today (2 Jan).

Review.Titre: I recently purchased a solid brass …
Review.Contenu: I recently purchased a solid brass fidget spinner which was not in the package that showed up at my door, inside was a battery which I did not order, and the packing slip says the contents of the package is supposed to be a fidget spinner.I've emailed the company 3 times on 3 separate days, and still no reply, I'very called the customer support line 2 days in a row no answer my order arrived Monday and today is Friday, no email response or call back, I've requested a refund and still no reply, starting to feel like I've been scammed!Do not buy form this company, no bueno no bueno

Review.Titre: Dissapointed; still looking for battery pack charger.
Review.Contenu: I needed a battery pack charger for rechargeable Ni-MH 2.4V 2000mAh,4.8Wh Garmin battery pack GPS batteries. I ordered the Tenergy 2.4-7.2V NiMH/NiCD battery pack charger.When I received it and opened the box; it was not anything close to what I needed. None of the leads for connecting the negative and positive poles would remotely fit these AA battery packs that are manufactured with the two poles side by side that are turned and fused together, opposite of one another. They need to be clear in description what this battery charger fits.  I am open to suggestions if it can be made to work for what I need it for, because I am still searching.

I was trying to save myself some money but this will cost me time every other day to replace.  I was assured when I called about them that the life would be similar.  Run far away from this company.

I contacted customer service and instead of just sending a replacement roller brush over (which I'm sure costs nothing) or offering it for purchase I was basically told to throw the entire thing away and that they were sorry for the inconvenience. What a waste!!!!! If I could give it zero stars I would. They love to block people and won't publicize any negative reviews, so the reviews that you are seeing on their website are not the when story! I wish I knew this company didn't practice proper business ethics before I gave them my money
