It was flagged as Fraud, right out of the gate. I called on Monday. And talked to a young man. Who said YOU do this to everyone ( first time buyers ), and that a person calls to verify name and address SAME DAY,. THAT DID NOT HAPPEN !!! THIS YOUNG MAN TOLD ME HE WAS SORRY THE BALL WAS DROPPED AND THAT HE WOULD MAKE SURE IT WENT OUT ASAP IN 1 OR 2 DAY SHIPPING. I was Impressed, I checked on my order later that day NOTHING. I talked to someone in chat.  i was NOT HAPPY. i ASK A QUESTION  I EXPECT AN ANSWER NOT THE RUN AROUND. NOT EXCUSES AND NOT TO BE TALKED DOWN ON. i AM STILL WAITING FOR MY ORDER !!!!!! 2 JANUARY 21
Slow to respond.  Have not received my order yet I placed almost 2 weeks ago. label says Shipping Label Created, USPS Awaiting Item for the last 4 days now.

Review.Titre: It's extremely frustrating when you gat …
Review.Contenu: It's extremely frustrating when you gat these before you receive the product.According to my email notification, the batteries were delivered yesterday...they were not...
I cancelled the order just minutes after ordering and was advised that it couldn't be cancelled. It was delivered and I returned it UPS but no refund was given??????
I ordered button top batteries. Not flat top batteries.How do I go about returning a order of unwanted flat topped batteries. Yours truly George Stack

Review.Titre: I received email to receive $5 off my…
Review.Contenu: I received email to receive $5 off my purchase and did not receive it. I sent an email  to the  company and did not receive a response.  Very unhappy  right now.

Review.Titre: When ordering I specifically asked if…
Review.Contenu: When ordering I specifically asked if charger worked for all 123 batteries. When I received charger it only charges tenergy batteries which I do not own.
I don't like that my credit card was charged as soon as I ordered but the order wasn't shipped for 5 days. There was no option on the website to cancel the order, only to reorder.

Review.Titre: I wanted to explore further purchases…
Review.Contenu: I wanted to explore further purchases on your site,a request to register was recommended,my effort to register on your site was continually rejected.At this time I remain after 3 tries to register on your site I have chosen to remain unregistered and will seek purchase options on another site. Thank you Stephan

I didn't receive a purchase confirmation email or shipping updates. The product is correct and arrived in the time it should have, but I wasn't certain the order was placed and I was suspicious I had been scammed for a few days until the product showed up

Review.Titre: the shipping was fine but the unit has…
Review.Contenu: the shipping was fine but the unit has ruined several of my batteries.  also i get a ton of spam from trustpilot.

Unlike many reviewers I was very disappointed by this company’s processing &/or handling delivery.  Had a hard time learning status of my order.  It’s too soon to address quality of the products. Battery charger included in the battery pkg was better than expected.

I unknowingly ordered both 600ah and 750ah batteries last year and the difference is astonishing. The 600ah I have to charge after 1 to 2 weeks of use. The 750ah last months. Why the difference escapes me, but I just ordered 12 of the 750ah batteries. Had I only had 600ah from Tenergy, I would have become an avid critic of the companies rechargeable batteries. Why they are both described as Arlo approved, I have no idea. So my experience with Tenergy batteries is so mixed that I will call it a draw at this point.

I ordered 4 Tenergy 9V batteries, and you never let me know that the batteries were NOT in stock.  When I contacted you a week later you said that you would send a email with the tracking number when the batteries were sent out, you did not do that either.  Excellent product, terrible service.JLK

Review.Titre: Website offered free shipping on a $70…
Review.Contenu: Website offered free shipping on a $70 order with next business day shipping. Turned out to be $100 shipping and two days later it still hadn’t shipped. I called to see what was going on. They said they couldn’t ship LiPo via air and we’re planning to contact me. They ended up charging $50 to ship ground. Seems they could have figured this out in the first place.

Poor Customer Service I ordered a battery from them and had to cancel the order, which they did immediately. I was told I would get a refund in 1-3 days but after 4 days I still hadn't gotten a refund so I e-mailed them about it. They told me they would figure out what the issue was but it took another 3 days for them to confirm that I would be getting a refund soon. The next day I got my refund, but I was getting suspicious that I was never going to get a refund.

Review.Titre: Wrong item was shipped, but customer is responsible to return or will be charged?
Review.Contenu: Wrong item was shipped.  In order to get a replacement, I need repackage and drop off at post office with RMA label, otherwise I'll be charged for the wrong item, which I didn't buy.  The effort that I've already put into this (haven't even shipped it yet) is already exceeding the replacement cost.  Time wasted between all of the shipping is the worst part.

Sneaky. Forces me to enter an email address to place an order and automatically checks the "Subscribe to our newsletter." even if you uncheck the box, it saves it with it being checked. Not cool people. If I wanted your newsletter I would check the box. As for the batteries. Their claim of "recharge up to 500 times" .. Baloney. I bought batteries 3 years ago for my Arlo cameras and have recharged them, at most, a couple dozen times and they are all dying one by one.

Review.Titre: I bought two of the 8 pack rechargeable…
Review.Contenu: I bought two of the 8 pack rechargeable batteries with charger. One of the set of 8 do not hold a charge. I put them in my Arlo camera and set the camera setting for best battery life and they still died right away. Within a day of putting them in. The camera is on the side of the house so there is no traffic going through there yet it still died within 24 hrs of  changing them.

When I received my order it was short a package of batteries.  I contacted the company and they acted like I was trying to steal them. They required me to take a picture of what I received and email it to them.  That was really stupid because if I was stealing them I just would take a picture with 1 package short.  It actually too several weeks to get it straightened out.  I won't do business with them again unless I have NO choice.

Review.Titre: I bought the large quantity of solar…
Review.Contenu: I bought the large quantity of solar batteries.  I was excited and expected them to work for a long time, they did not.  Some only worked for a few weeks (yes in the full sun).  Others did not work when I took them out of the package.The price was okay for the quantity.  But the quality of the batteries working was poor and disappointing.

There are couple reasons I only gave two stars. First of all the window does not open on its own when pushing unlock button. I have to put my nail in air vent to lift open. Also I thought it could charge mor batteries at one time. Also, thought it had enough room in it to store batteries when not in use.

In all honesty, received the batteries on or about January 18 and installed four in my Front porch Arlo camera which is normally dormant due to little mobility to capture.  Once functioning Arlo showed the batteries at 97 percent.  February 4th checked on the system and found the batteries on the camera measuring 21 percent. That was very fast and didn't last as the previous batteries I use.  I expect more based on advertising?  Oh well?

The batteries are not holding the power like I thought they would.  Regular batteries are lasting at least 2 to 3 months and these lose a lot of power within a week.  I use them in my Arlo cameras.  Also one battery would not charge to a “full” charge.  Maybe I got a bad batch of batteries.  I don’t know.

The product (in the past) has been good. But ordering this time was very slow. The person they assigned to assist was unhelpful (and possibly detrimental). When I ordered online (after getting some help), there was nothing saying there's a very expensive hazmat fee for sending batteries 2nd day air. So we lost one or two days (time is critical and I let them know that). Also, it shouldn't take 6 days to get to the middle of the country by Ground. At least one courier  company can get a package delivered by ground anywhere in the country in 4 days. To be fair, that may have changed with supply-chain issues. But many of these issues could be fixed.

The only reason they get a second star is because they were never rude. Ratings of the batteries I bought were not clearly identified on the web page - had to pour thru several tab type menus to get the required info. The batteries didn’t meet expectations and customer service took over a week of back & forth emails with attached videos & photos with circles & arrows to come to a “NO. We won’t take them back.” Decision. Buyer beware.

Review.Titre: At this point I am very disappointed
Review.Contenu: At this point I am very disappointed. 80$ for 16 pack of rechargeable batteries. It was marked “free shipping” and then as I’m about to check out, my order goes from 98$ with tax to 178$. It is 80$ for shipping. So much for the “free shipping.” I also ended up buying the battery charger cheaper on amazon. And now I just got an email from them saying my item is class 9 hazardous and if I don’t pay 132$ In fees, my shipping time will be delayed. What a joke. This company hides a lot of important information.

Review.Titre: No better than the standard gold rechargeable.
Review.Contenu: Bought a full complement of these for my Arlo system. Previously had standard Tenergy batteries. Full charged all 4 sets of 4 but decided to test them against the basic Tenergy ---as I suspected---they did not last any longer than the standard ---- don't waste your money upgrading to these high capacity

Review.Titre: New lithium that Weren't as Advertised
Review.Contenu: I thought I bought 8 New lithium ion rechargeable batteries and a battery charger. I got 8 lithium ion batteries that were almost totally discharged (about 20% each). I called to complain and was told that they have to be mailed this way, legally. There was Nothing Anywhere in or on the packaging to indicate they had to be fully charged before use. That Consumer Disclosure could and should have been made in their advertising and packaging.

I queried the company about the weight of battery pack 34042-03. I was informed that the pack weighed 56grams. On the basis of this I purchased 2 of the packs. The actual weight of each pack is 102grams.

Review.Titre: Where the heck is my battery ?
Review.Contenu: I did not expect it to take this long for my battery to arrive. I only ordered ONE battery - because I wanted to TEST it before I ordered a couple more. It never occurred to me that it would take well over two weeks for the battery to be shipped and arrive at my house.Actually - they promised it would arrive on Monday or Tuesday.....today is Saturday and still NO freaking battery.What happened ? Did it get lost in the mail ?

Review.Titre: Battery never arrived - poor customer service
Review.Contenu: Ordered a battery on March 5th. Free shipping. Today is March 22nd and I have yet to see the item. It was supposed to be delivered on March 13th, but was not. I have made several attempts to reach out to All-Battery, both email and phone call. Today(March 22nd), I spoke with one of their reps who informed that he would resend the item. No explanation, no signs of concerns on the reps part. Not sure I will be a repeat customer.

Review.Titre: Actual lead time on items is in fine print. Poor Communication.
Review.Contenu: I ordered a battery and charger and received a tracking number. When the order didn't show up I called and they referred me to the fine print that said it would be another 8-10 days. I just got notification (almost 3 weeks after the order) that the charger is not in stock and even though I received another email saying the order was shipped, it wasn't really. Won't be ordering again from them.

Response and shipping were fine, but one of the battery types I wanted was not what I received.  I wanted a 386 battery.  When I requested the 386 on your website it redirected me to AG13/LR44 which I ordered.  Turns out this battery is not interchangeable with the 386 as it is too thick and won't fit in my application.  This was disappointing.  Do you not carry the 386 battery?

Purchased an Appbot-Link from All Battery.  Ordering is easy, shipping is quick, product came as expected.  However it doesnt reliably charge while on the base, many times it will wont charge after docking and the robot is drained during the day just sitting there.  It is then unusable.  Haven't had an opportunity to get back with customer service yet, more a problem with product quality than All Battery.

Placed order for item that showed in stock, sent payment, and received tracking number. Item stated at ups ready to ship for 3 days then I get an email stating item was not in stock and there is no known date when it will be available. I wasn't given offer of similar items or even a small discount  off another purchase.  I canceled and got refund, found items I needed at batteryspace.com

Review.Titre: Often delayed shipping and inaccurate stock information
Review.Contenu: Twice I have placed orders only to find out that the items I ordered were inaccurately portrayed as having been in stock when they were in fact not in stock. This has delayed my projects. On one occasion, it delayed my project by a number of weeks. I find this deeply troubling and would suggest that All Battery improve their inventory management to accurately reflect stock levels and do a better job of keeping items in stock.

Review.Titre: Still no delivery... Would order somewhere else
Review.Contenu: Order batteries on November 16. Today November 29. Still no batteries have arrived. First time I contacted support, they told me my order was selected as a random audit check. I received no call or email. I was told I would get a call in the next 10 minutes. Got a call 2 days later. Have been waiting for shipment. I called again and was told order was on backorder. I was also told I would be sent a tracking number. Neither has happened. Very disappointed with service. My CC was charged with no delay !

This is the 3rd or 4th time I have ordered from them but certain they have gotten worse. My orders mostly don't show on my account so I can't tell you how many I ordered. Customer service won't connect them with my account so they are lost. Also very slow to ship. The products are nice as are there prices but this is probably the last order.

Review.Titre: How long does it take to ship an item?
Review.Contenu: It has been over a week and my tracking information still says that a label was created 8 days ago but the item has not shipped. This is for my parent's chair lift so such delays puts a strain on them physically. The price also went up on a battery that only lasted a year. Hopefully I will find another source before I need to order again.

Ordered on 2/10/17 for 2/17/17 delivery.  Delivery delayed until 2/21/17.Did not ship until 5 days after the order was placed, and funds received.  11 days for delivery is slow in this day and age.  Order was only 6 D-Cell batteries.  Will look elsewhere next time.Cannot review the product, as I am still waiting to receive shipment.

Review.Titre: Sent the wrong charger to the the wrong address
Review.Contenu: I purchased rechargeable batteries and a charger. The charger data sheet clearly indicates the mAH range of the battery packs it works with and the charger that was sent was not applicable fro the battery pack I received. The customer service was friendly. Suggest you have a more experienced person checking orders or recommending batteries and a chargers.

Review.Titre: Can't review what I never received
Review.Contenu: Placed and paid for order 11/27/15. Not shipped until 12/2. As of today 12/4, package is still in California, heading to PA. Not expected to receive from UPS until 12/11, maybe. Email shows up today asking if I'm satisfied with my purchase. Never had a problem with this company before but after reading some of the reviews, it looks like I'm not alone with the slow shipping. Hope it's a one time screw up. Can't review what I don't have

I gave been waiting and waiting and have not received my order. The order was placed on 1-1-2017 at 1:50 am.  It is stated on my receipt that the order will ship in 3 to 7 business days.  As the order was place on a holiday, I figured it to be 4 to 8 business days before it would ship.  I just need the merchandise.  Please advise.

Review.Titre: product is over priced but you have a…
Review.Contenu: product is over priced but you have a controlled market if a person wants a decent battery.I ordered Panasonic rechargeable batteries and charger.  This what came with the Arlo cameras and are performing better than   the Tenergy power.  After charging they lasted about a week the needed recharging.  To be fair not all 16 are having problems.  only 8 are having issues.  Part of the problem appears to be the charger as batteries never show full as it should, shows 4.17.  this the cameras are not showing more than one or two 10 sec videos a day.

I ordered two "To be assembled" battery packs on 5/29. I was informed that as a special order, it would take 10 days to receive them. It's been 7 days, and the tracking number is still only telling me that "a label has been created." After 7 days, I would expect a more updated message would have been provided..

I placed an order a few days later received an email stating one of my items are out of stock. when I replied all I received was a tracking id. no conformation weather or not my other item will ship. now when I decide to order the item that was out of stock again ill have to pay shipping because I wont qualify for free shipping

Review.Titre: Well when I got the battery I had to …
Review.Contenu: Well when I got the battery I had to pay for more postage post office said they used a envelope that was for letters and ext,then I ordered 20 battery 16 where in a box and the other 4 where just laying in the envelope so the tabs where sticking out of the envelope so they all got here but a rough ride.Thank you

I was willing to overlook the inadequate packaging -  a paper mailer - since the chargers were not real fragile and survived the crushing that they received in transit. However, my NiMH battery packs got so hot during charging, that I feared they would ignite.  I will be looking elsewhere for a reliable NiMH charger.

Review.Titre: Usually good but this last order horrible
Review.Contenu: Ordered batteries paid for batteries got an email that order was processed for shipping got a tracking number and then an email saying the batteries I ordered were out of stock with no anticipated availability date. If batteries out of stock it should say so on the order screen before payment accepted. Very poor business.

Review.Titre: Item was not in stock on original request
Review.Contenu: Been buying the same item since 2004. Went to make a purchase and item showed no longer available. Impacted our production. Had to contact engineering to approve a new battery pack. There was not information about when of if product would be available again. After two weeks, the product showed available again after much hustling and wasted time on our end. Please put a product availability date on product that continues to be stocked OR make it clear if product will no longer be available.

I have ordered from All-Battery before, but it has been 3 years. I like their products. My recent order was placed January 3. Tracking shows it was delivered Jan.7--to a front porch 1900 miles from me!!  I called customer service number Jan. 7 to report error. I received a recording asking I leave a detailed message, including "the name of the company" I was calling about! I received a call back Jan. 9, saying my items were reshipped to my home Priority 2 day. It's Jan 12, still no pkg.

Purchased "I-Phone compatible" Tenergy Super Power Bank, item # 51029. When an item is advertised as I-Phone compatible customer expectations are for the item to connect to an I-Phone with what is provided in that package. This product is only I-Phone compatible when using a cable that is not included in the package. This product is not I-Phone compatible with what is provided. Misleading the customer with false advertisement. I am looking for a new source to do business with.

I have not received the items ordered to review. I received a tracking number a week ago. When I go to tracking number, it says a shipping label has been created but has not yet shipped. I will guess that the box is still sitting at store with no label and no one is sure where it need to go at this point.

Seems like a good site, but my first order did not work properly.  Spent an hour on chat w the service dept. They also couldn't figure it out.   Still waiting on a response to the email I was asked to send.   If they can get me fixed up, I'll try again. Otherwise, I'll have to look somewhere else

I placed an order and was thrilled with the product of rechargeable camera batteries so I placed a second order for three additional sets. However none the batteries I received on the second order take a charge. They appear to be ready according to the charging base but my camera says 6% and they last less than 5 minutes in my device. My emails for support have gotten one response via automation stating a ticket was started. But no results have come from this and no human replies have been received.Frustrated and disappointed!

Well first, they cancelled my order without giving me an explanation.  Apparently the called me and I didn't pick up so they cancelled.  Then I tried to contact them and ask them why my order was cancelled and they said my card was rejected and I should bring it up with my bank - this is the first instance of my card not working.  Then I tried to get a hold of them and ask them what I can do about it because my bank says the card should work - and it was an absolute nightmare getting them to respond to me.  Terrible experience.

Prices seem good, but it's been ten days since my order, and still no batteries. The company asks me to rate them before I've even received my order. That sort of thing is ridiculous, and most companies play this game. They don't bother to check if the order was completed. They just want "feedback," and they dun you with emails until you give it.Okay, I've given it. I'll look elsewhere in the future, even if it means a somewhat higher price. Actually GETTING what you order is worth paying a bit more, if necessary!

Review.Titre: You sent the wrong battery charger --you sent…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a battery charger --you sent the wrong one as there are several size batteries rated at 3.7V.When I called about the error you said I had to pay for the shipping to return it.  It makes more sense to just keep it .  I have ordered and received the correct one.

I ordered the item over two weeks ago, from Fremont, CA. Living in Sacramento, I could have walked to Fremont and back by now to pick it up. Not a word from All-Battery about the status of my order. Only the single email asking me what I think of their service. Two words: NOT MUCH.

Battery charger not that great.  A couple batteries already not showing on charger.  Do not know if charger or batteries.  Asked questions from support but no answer from them.  Buy from a company that actually answers your questions.

All-battery asked me to rate them, so...  They sent me a tracking number on the 5th and here it is about to turn over to the 12th and nothing's been shipped.  Tracking shows "Pre-Shipment Info Sent to USPS.  This does not indicate receipt by the USPS or the actual mailing date".  I would expect a shipment to be delivered to USPS within a day or two of placing the order.  I think a week is excessive and that's assuming it gets shipped tomorrow.  I guess I will have to contact them to find out what's going on and I think that's a problem.

Horrible experience. I paid for and selected USPS and they unilaterally changed it to USP (takes well over a week to arrive). When I called them and asked about it they said that it was their policy. Additionally they gave my order information to an outside company!

Review.Titre: Shiny and Fancy Labels Do Not Guarrantee A Good Product
Review.Contenu: First, all of these product are marked made in China. This then tells me from their history how well they are made. Second the product such as a D cell that are suppose to have 500 charge and discharge cycles sometimes do not make it past 5 cycles- I have a shorted cell here for example. Then I have numerous AA cells that have not made it past 30 to 40 cycles and all this while using their very own chargers which also indicate the cells are bad even before 30 cycles are used.I have had the 9V batteries explode on me in the chargers. This all adds up to indicate a poorly made product as they have real trouble making a 100% reliable item. Buy American!

Review.Titre: You sent me an email that told me my…
Review.Contenu: You sent me an email that told me my order was on hold and I had to call to clear it and you gave me 48 hrs.  Called, got voice mail, left a message.  Did not get called back with the 48 hrs.  I sent an email immediately telling you the information was valid and please complete the order - no reply.  When you called, after the 48 hr window, I verified the information I provided.  Then my order was on hold for another 5-6 days.  I had to call again to find our the batteries were being built and would be sent when they were done.  Why did you not tell me that when you called me?  All-in-all, not a good experience and would not order again from this company.

I ordered 80 AA 2600 NiMH Batteries.Received 60 AA 2600 NiMH Batteries and 24 NiCd  Batteries that I cannot use.Left a voice mail message with All-Battery.com this morning to get the correct parts and a Return Authorization to send the Batteries I cannot use back

I ordered May 27th and realized it was a holiday weekend.  I upgraded my order to UPS one day (another $10) because I needed items for my overseas trip.  I had to call on Wed because my order still wasn't in the system.  All Battery rep said it wasn't a guarantee one day shipping - Great!!  Three hours later when I checked on my order it was all of a sudden in the system ready to ship.  It still didn't arrive until Monday June 6.  I picked it up on my way to the airport.  Bad customer service, but great products at a great price.   I feel I deserve my upgraded money back!!!

Review.Titre: The batteries did not weigh what was stated in the advertisment.
Review.Contenu: Although the batteries preformed adequately, they didn't weigh what was stated in the advertisement. The weight was the biggest factor I used in their purchase. I have got several batteries on ebey, the weight and the power has gone hand in hand. The heavier the more power and these batteries were supposed to be heavier than all that I got from ebey. It turns out they are no heavier than the best I got from ebey. I expected All Battery to be the standard from which to judge others. Turns out they are just as prone to over statements as ebey. At least on ebey I would probably get a refund.

Good: Web site was easy enough to pick and choose, ordering was simple.Bad: I needed something else and located it and went to checkout and the tax on the second order war more than the item I wanted. Undecided: The review beat the product delivery.

Review.Titre: Slow shipping, batteries are poor performers.
Review.Contenu: I have 1s Tenergys that perform great, but these 2s 900mah tenergys are larger and dont last but half the time of the xk batteries they are used to replace. I really expected much better quality from Tenergy batteries. I thought Tenergy was the best.

Batteries wouldn't hold a recharge after after a few cycles.  Bought for an Arlo camera, so instead replaced the camera with one that can be recharged through a solar cell instead of replacing the batteries again.

Review.Titre: Good batteries, watch the fine print
Review.Contenu: Always have liked the batteries but very disappointed in last experience. Had a coupon code for a free keychain backup power source and added it into the cart. Received my order in the normal quick response time but the free item was missing. Used the online chat to find out why and was told that even though I DID add it, I didn't add it again in the checkout phase but if I was willing to pay the shipping they would send it to me. Told them I wasn't going to pay more in shipping than the item was worth and their response was basically too bad. Will have to seriously consider using this company again.

This order was placed on 9/1and I was told it would arrive by 9/8. The order wasn't even scanned by UPS until 9/7. It is scheduled to arrive 9/14 That is a long wait for a $15 shipping fee. No comment on the product as it has yet to arrive.

If you need a battery in less than a few weeks, do not order from here.  I needed two batteries and ordered with a two week lead time.  At 10 days the batteries haven't even shipped.  Deadline will be missed.  Highly regret this order.

ordered $76 worth of batteries and received nothing,nada,zip,zero batteries only empty mailer package.not packaged well,should be more carefull .send me my order,make it good,your fault,then i will give good review.?????????????????#$$%%!!!

Recieved email from shipper that package was cancelled. Never recieved any info about what was going on with it from the company. Did receive the package from different carrier a day later than supposed to. Paid for 2nd day air.

Review.Titre: created shipping label on Monday but…
Review.Contenu: created shipping label on Monday but didn't actually ship until Friday!  Poor service and no live person available to address the situation.  I tried to call several times but just got a message that no reps were there.

Found the site easy to navigate still have not yet received my order and when I track it it just tells me a shipping label was created nothing else tomorrow willvbe 7 days since I ordered it.  Not sure if I will purchase from here again.

Review.Titre: Poor packaging and wrong items shipped
Review.Contenu: The goods were shipped in a mailing envelope and were loose and able to bang around. A battery case was broken.  The order also shipped the wrong batteries,  AAA instead of the AA ordered.  Emailed Customer Service but no reply yet.

I just placed my order 4 days ago I have not received it yet or a shipping confirmation email or an order confirmation email gave it a 2-star because I don't know the quality of product because I have not received it

Review.Titre: Ordered in December but due to your…
Review.Contenu: Ordered in December but due to your internal process your team cancelled the order. Very complicated process to place a simple order. It's easier to order via Amazon. Please use amazon to fix your issues.

Review.Titre: Your webpage said that shipping was FREE
Review.Contenu: Your webpage said that shipping was free on orders over $50 my order is $91 with $8.80 shipping how was that free shipping please reply there are other people out there selling batteries

Review.Titre: I ordered a charger for the Tenergy …
Review.Contenu: I ordered a charger for the Tenergy Li-ion CRC123A batteries and what I though were 12 more compatible rechargeable batteries. The 12 extra batteries are not compatible with my Arlo security camera system and can not be charged in the charger.The 12 batteries were the CRC132A LiFe-PO4 batteries and while if you look hard enough at the detailed description you find that the LiFe-PO4 batteries are not reccommended for the Arlo cameras. Now I have to send the batteries back at my cost ($11). I still do not have enough rechargeable batteries for my 3 cameras. I guess I have a bone to pick with Netgear also as their Arlo cameras can only use one brand of rechargeable batteries, also not made clear.

I ordered the DL 1/3 N battery. The battery I received was the incorrect part number and size for my tool. I called and received an RMA number to return the batteries. The service personnel are very good and helpful.
Was hoping to use these to replace the unprotected batteries that came with the device, but sadly they are too long.  Not the batteries fault, but will see if I can return them.

Review.Titre: Did both received the batteries on time
Review.Contenu: I order a 2 day Shipment, then when I required explanation the custom service rep told me it is only when UPS decides to ship.. I received my batteries  wI think in 9 day of the paid for 2day shipment, NOT HAPPY

The tracking status of this order has been "Ready for UPS pickup" for five days.  Sending an email with a tracking number when there is in fact no transit taking place is a poor communication process.

Review.Titre: Earth day coupon for 15% was just a "come on" coupon for nothing.
Review.Contenu: There was a "come on" coupon for 15% off on an "earth day" special coupon the catch was that you had to forfeit the free shipping that come on orders over $75.00.  The end result was that it was cheaper to take the free shipping on an order in excess of $300.00.  I tried to split the order to into two but the real savings were still not there.  I called and talked to a customer rep who said the all too common "Sorry but there is nothing I can do...only one coupon per order".  The big 15% savings was just a "come on" to get me to place an order.  As just a normal person that works hard for my money I will do the only thing that I can do and that is to take my business somewhere else.

Review.Titre: sad is the word of the day
Review.Contenu: spend over a $1000 and no correspondence, sad service still not received my order 10 days later after paying an extra $60 for hazardous goods and over $200 for express delivery. SAD is the word of the day
This is the last time I buy 9v Li-ion batteries. The last time 2 out of 6 were bad this time 1 out of 4 bad, I didn't learn the last time but I will remember to never buy 9v LI-ion recharge again.

Review.Titre: Made a purchase with Tenergy Power on…
Review.Contenu: Made a purchase with Tenergy Power on the web site and with an service opp and never received my purchase. After two weeks I had to call once again to reorder the product again!
My questions were never answered.  I tried to ask questions about getting lower pricing when buying in bulk if I signed a no return, no cancel agreement.  No one ever replied.
Said my order would be shipped, then a day later informed me the product was out of stock. We are traveling so I had a specific time frame to receive the charger. I cancelled the order.
The process of ordering was great, but I have still yet to receive my product. Ordered on the 9-24-16 and now I'm being told it should be received 10-4-16 ...Ten days for batteries.

Review.Titre: I have been a customer of All-Battery…
Review.Contenu: I have been a customer of All-Battery (now Tenergy Power) for 10yrs. I went to do my annual Christmas shopping on line at Tenergy and to my great delight there was a banner across the middle of the page saying use this code for 20% off your order. Great, right? Wrong! When I had my order ready to check out, I input the discount code but a red banner came up saying, 'the code is not valid'. So, I tried it again. Then I called CS. That's when I was told that the code was no longer valid...and that there was nothing anyone could do. I was in retail for over 35yrs; I guarantee I would never let that stand in the way of good customer service.  I have had issues with Tenergy not calculating discounts properly in the past, but they always made it work. This time, they didn't and it has left a bad taste in my mouth.

Review.Titre: It's almost impossible to buy these…
Review.Contenu: It's almost impossible to buy these products in Canada. The shipping charge on batteries was very expensive, over 100$! There should be more options.
A week after placing my order i got an email saying there was an extra handling fee and questioning i place a second 'order' for the amount of the fee. Big waste of time

Review.Titre: I shouldn't have to find out after I order an item that it is out of stock
Review.Contenu: The title is basically the issue. I ordered an item that wasn't in stock and this was an inconvenience. I gave 2 stars, however there wasn't a lot of "friction".
You need a "null" review option.  All I know is that they created a UPS label a week ago, and it's supposed to arrive tomorrow, but AFAIK nothing has shipped.

Review.Titre: Shipping said free one day shipping
Review.Contenu: Shipping said free one day shipping, went to order and said it was $5.00 and some change. Didn’t even leave the story until 3 days after purchase. Will update
I was expecting my S7 edge would fast charge with the cable that came along and with the S7 edge wall charger that came with phone bundle, but it is not fast charging.
The connector sticking out of the battery wobbles when I try to plug in the helicopter. It's that way on all six batteries.  Very disappointed. Kerry Gilham

Review.Titre: Never got batteries but tracking say…
Review.Contenu: Never got batteries but tracking say it's delivered.After support finally responded, month, the batteries were finally delivered.

Review.Titre: I purchased batteries and chargers last…
Review.Contenu: I purchased batteries and chargers last Friday and they have yet to be sent to me.  Last time I looked yesterday, U.S.P.S. have yet to receive my order.
I ordered batteries on Dec 10th, it is now Dec 18th and the package is still in CA.  Look for another place to order batteries from unless your not in a hurry.
Too early yet,the smaller nicads did very well, but the next size up did not do so well.  Installing more into battery paks now.  Will review again.

Review.Titre: Everything was fine except for shipping options
Review.Contenu: Everything was fine except for one important issue, shipping options.  USPS does not deliver in this region.  We use UPS or FedEx for deliveries.

Review.Titre: I was looking for more technical info…
Review.Contenu: I was looking for more technical info for charging and testing metal based batteries. I didn’t get it. Good line of product , no backup technical information nor knowledge based information to ensure top performance from stored and charged batteries

Review.Titre: Great selection, slow processing and shipping
Review.Contenu: Nice selection of battery products and ordered what I needed.  I will say it took them 6 days to process order and ship it out.  And that is after I sent in a message to customer service asking about order and when I could expect it.  For two small batteries this waiting period was excessive and will likely be almost a week and a half.  Hopefully products work correctly when I do finally receive them.

Review.Titre: some times all the good doesnt cover a possible bad product
Review.Contenu: What I dont like so far, the batteries I got, don't appear to be capable of getting and holding a charge. The two year old batteries I've been using took a charge right away, they just cant last all night. My new batteries don't show any sign of charge at all. Any help in this matter would be appreciated.

In the past, the product was great, delivery was expedient and I was a satisfied customer.  I have had to complain too frequently as half of the batteries I receive are no good as soon as I put them in my cameras.  I once got some extra free, next time they wanted me to send the bad ones back and the third time, I threw half of the box away.  Product quality is lacking.

I purchased  a a package of D cell batteries that had free shipping. After adding a smaller and less heavy pack of AA cell batteries that were in a smaller pack of less weight, I lost the free shipping.  Even though they shipped in the same package...Tenergy is the first company that has not honored a free shipping price because of adding an item of lower cost and weight.NOT COOL

Review.Titre: I ordered the wrong battery size
Review.Contenu: I ordered the wrong battery size. I immediately contacted the company to request a change. The company would not allow the change because the order had been placed and paid for, even though I immediately noticed my error.

Review.Titre: Great, On delivery time. An issue with size on the DC end.
Review.Contenu: The delivery time on my purchase was great, how ever the DC end of the charger is the wrong size, its to small, I don't know if I can splice the right size to it or not, ?? Maybe there should be a option on these, for different sizes, ?? It is for a battery operated security light.. Thank you.
Placed the order 2/25 Tenergt said I would get an email with info on the purchase, it's now the 28th no email but the cost is on my credit card!

Review.Titre: Slow on shipping took 7 days or more to…
Review.Contenu: Slow on shipping took 7 days or more to ship had to call to get shipping confirmation they did call back and gave me a possible shipping date

Review.Titre: The battery was out of stock.
Review.Contenu: Unfortunately the battery I requested was out of stock but the lady I talked to, suggested a substitute which I ordered and hope it works.

I received my batteries but like the last order I got they are only normal charged. My first time order through Walmart showed a full charge and are still working after 5-6 months the normal charge ones only last a couple days and then show low, I have to throw away.

I was disappointed I had to limit my choice of options for the premium pro batteries I bought to groups of just 20.  In the past, I'm pretty sure I bought your previous premium version in a 60 pack, which means a lower price per each price.  You almost made me go look at your competitors.Shipping was quick and appreciated!

Ordered product May 28th. Today is June 4th and product is still sitting in California facility waiting to be shipped out.  Tenergy website indicated about 3 days shipping time. Understandably, it was a holiday weekend on Monday, but to still be at USPS shipping facility 4 days after holiday is a bit long. My guess won't receive product until sometime next week.

Before using the batteries, I cycled them thru 3 discharge/charge cycles, then measured capacity. One of the three was 25% lower than specified capacity. Cycled again and retested, still 25% lower than capacity. The other three tested fine.

Although there is good customer service, it took two days to send an email to let me know something was out of stock. Even if I answered the email the day it was sent, the order would not have made it to my grandson for his birthday.  Maybe as soon as an item becomes out of stock, it will flag any orders when ordered then another choice could be made immediately.

Great product at a reasonable price, but it took an inordinate amount of time (about 10 weeks) to receive it.Quality is solid, appears reliable, and has nice features (LED, variable intensity, and different color temperature options).  All-in-all, if you have to stand a long wait, it's ultimately worth it.

Review.Titre: place them in my arlo camera and the…
Review.Contenu: place them in my arlo camera and the camera kept disconnecting from the hub. I replaced the batteries with a non-rechargeable energizer battery, and I have no problems with the camera disconnected from the hub. The batteries only seem to work for a short time and for some reason I have to reset the camera when I use Tenergy batteries with the arlo camera.

Review.Titre: The buying experience was okay however…
Review.Contenu: The buying experience was okay however the product did not perform as expected, from the batteries received, one set lasted less than a week while another lasted for a month, all batteries lart of the same package. Havent tried the last set but so far it's been a very mixed experience.

Pros: Very nice customer service, replaced defective (expanding Li-Po battery) item very quickly, without hassle or requesting that I return the original.Cons: Defective item was replaced with a second, equally defective item. I probably won’t be contacting customer service again, I’ll just replace the battery on my own, despite the uncommon connector.

Review.Titre: Sub C battery I ordered is too big to fit my Sub C device
Review.Contenu: I ordered a sub C size battery to fit in a device I have that uses sub C size.  The battery I received from All Battery will not fit in my device.  I wasted my money.  In their behalf, they did give me the battery dimensions, but I didn't check them against my device.  Isn't a sub C, a sub C all the way around?  The two other battery packs I ordered are just fine and I am using them in my RC planes.

I buy Li-on battery packs.  I get an immediate acknowledgement of the order and a tracking number for the shipment, but often have to wait a week or more for the pack to be made up, shipped, and delivered.Suggestion 1 - Make up and keep in stock the popular packs so that they can be shipped immediately.Suggestion 2 - If the packs have to be made up, provide some indication when that will happen.

Review.Titre: While they do have great prices and…
Review.Contenu: While they do have great prices and products, it is very difficult to speak to a sales person and get a quick answer to a question.  You have to e mail, then wait until they respond (usually 2-4 days.  Some of the response's were good, some were general and not really an answer, and vague.If price is your only concern they are great, if you need help and have technical questions, educate yourself elsewhere, then comeback and place your order.

Review.Titre: Good products, Very high international shipping charges!
Review.Contenu: Hi,I am very happy with the products available from 'All-Battery.com', and never had a need to ask for any warranty service.However the international shipping charges are just enormous - this one situation stops me purchasing more often. They have further items I defiantly  would purchase! This shipping cost is compared to other online stores in the USA shipping to this same Aust. address.

I just received my Tenergy Solis Smart Food Thermometer today in the mail and look forward to using it. If I could make a suggestion that the unit be looked at before packaging for future buyers as mine had a large scratch on the face of the unit.  Thank you. I emailed them my concerns with pictures and have not gotten a response.

They build a good 4.8 ,2000 ma battery of which I have never had any trouble with. The same company sells a 6.0 volt ,2000 ma battery that I have tested and all I can get out of two them 7.0 volts which is OK but then the most ma I get 150 out of rated 2000 ??????? I called and they did send me a replacement at no charge. I now have two 6.0 volt paper weights. Don't buy the 6.0 volt..

Tenergy batteries are fine and the website/shipping is also fine. I am frustrated that I had to spend $70 for a set of 12 rechargeable batteries and charger for my Arlo as it only comes with 12 non-rechargeable batteries. This should come standard with the set. Shady.

I was offered free shipping and given 5 choices.  Turns out free shipping did not apply to all the choices but all the choices were available to choose from.  I use the product and find it works really well.  Just hate that the website did not adjust the shipping choices if all are not free.

Review.Titre: Order took 2 days to be process
Review.Contenu: Order took 2 days to be process, then one of your sales rep told me the shipping charges are very different than i paid on my order and i have to switch to ups ground if not my shipping will be 160$ in addition to the 93$ shipping charges that i already pay..

Review.Titre: Products work well but it took way too…
Review.Contenu: Products work well but it took way too long to receive. 2 weeks!

The first time I clicked on the final step to process the online payment of my cart, the page failed and reloaded to the beginning of the cart process. This resulted in me having to call them to figure out if the order actually processed or not, which it didn't. Also, the checkout page does not provide a verified secure link for payments, as indicated by the absence of the lock symbol in Google Chrome, IE, and Mozilla Firefox. The products work well though.

Review.Titre: Need to check stock if your in a hurry
Review.Contenu: Ordered 15 sub-c batteries with tabs on Monday. Got the tracking number Monday afternoon.  Contacted on chat Thursday and was informed they were out of stock and had to be made. Did ship Thursday. When I received the batteries most of the tabs were not secured very well.  A lot of the spot welds were not done very well and did not adhere. Looked like a rush job.  Had to re-solder most the tabs.

Ordered batteries on 6/10/2015 in the AM.. Today is 6/17/2015 PM and I still haven't received any batteries. Funny, I ordered two trailer tires on Monday 6/15, and received them on Tues, 6/16, and they were "free shipping". Once again I ask. What Batteries.... If these were something I needed quickly I wouldn't be a happy camper, but since I'm not too concerned, it's no big deal.

Review.Titre: Can't get the batteries I need
Review.Contenu: After a week with a supplied tracking number they email me and told me to disregard the tracking number because what I ordered was out of stock until farther notice.  So I said fine just ship the other battery and I hope I get a lesser shipping fee since it's only one battery.  Well it's been another week and I have heard NOTHING,  nothing,  I dont know whats up.  WHAT'S UP!?  it used to be a good company.

The ordering process was fine, but I was supposed to receive a confirmation email that never arrived so I had no idea if my order went through or not.  I had to call your company to confirm myself.  No, there was no email from Tenergy in my junk or spam folders.

I ordered a battery for my I Robot Roomba. It came fairly quickly but the battery did not work. It stayed charged for only a short time and got very hot. I contacted the company who told me they would send a new one which would arrive in 1-2 days. I am still waiting. I sent back the old battery as instructed. I tried to call the company during regular business hours but was told no one was available to call back when they were open. I feel very frustrated.

Review.Titre: Your rechargeable AAA batteries do not last long enough
Review.Contenu: Even though the AAA rechargeable batteries do have a life based on usage, but it seems your batteries do not last 12 charges per year.  I have other AAA rechargeable batteries that I purchased from another firm, and I get twice as many charges and I purchased 3 years ago and they take a charge and their life is far better than your batteries.

I placed my order on July 2nd but have not received it yet.  According to the tracking e-mail I got it will not arrive until July 15th.  I ordered other parts from three different suppliers on July 2nd and they all have arrived already.  None of my orders had any special shipping.  Based on what is occuring here I can only rate All Battery with 3 stars.

I have now purchased AAA batteries from you twice.  On the most recent order the freight for the batteries was free.  This time I started adding additional items to the order.  I was shocked that the freight for these few items exceeded the price of the products I added.  I removed those items.  I will stick with purchasing just the batteries and purchase the accessories locally.  PS.  On a good note to end, the batteries are fantastic.  Thank you

Website is not great. Difficult to search.Don't have tabbed versions of each thing that I wanted and don't always have my desired quantities.On the other hand, they did have what I was looking for at a reasonable price.

Review.Titre: I would usually give 5 stars but this …
Review.Contenu: I would usually give 5 stars but this time I had a problem with the order which qualified for a discount. I went through the cart and checkout process as usual but using my VISA it didn't go through after several attempts. Several days later I refilled my cart but used Paypal and it went through but the cost was about $20 more.This isn't the first time I've had problems ordering and think your system could be greatly improved by simplifying the process.The order was #540740

I just received the TLP4000 battery charger yesterday.  Although I have not had time to check it out, it is the type of charger I was looking for, as I am converting my G scale train engines to battery power.  The type of conversion calls for a charger that has your features. I am looking forward to see how well it works.

Review.Titre: Reasonable parts cost, exhorbitant shipping costs
Review.Contenu: No problem with my order. The charge controller and charger were as advertised. However, All Battery charges to Canada are exceptionally high.  Other suppliers that I order from will ship USPS which come right through with reasonable International postage charges. Shippers that use UPS, FEDEX are exposed to over exploited brokerage charges.

Review.Titre: products are great but took 2 months…
Review.Contenu: products are great but took 2 months and three shipments to get my three item. 1st shipment only had one item(two were missing) took 6 weeks to get second shipment(sent double of one item still missing the cable) 3 weeks I received my cable.

Review.Titre: I find it frustrating that I chose to…
Review.Contenu: I find it frustrating that I chose to buy the more expensive rechargeable batteries and a year later im struggling to have them keep and hold a charge for more then 45 minutes right off charger now I have to buy all new rechargeable batteries.

After sending two unanswered e-mails, trying to order the right batteries for my solar lights, I ordered what I thought was needed. They were the wrong batteries. After returning the batteries, they did reimburse me for what I paid for them but not the return postage.Why do you have a help line but do not respond to questions!!!!!

Review.Titre: I purchased the Tenergy LifePO4 RCR123A …
Review.Contenu: I purchased the Tenergy LifePO4 RCR123A Battery Charger plus 6 RCR123A LifePO4 400mAh Batteries for my Arlo camera. I have fully charged the batteries and inserted them into my Arlo camera. The Arlo indicates that the batteries are only charged 2%. Are these batteries compatible with Arlo cameras? Any suggestions?

I would have given a higher rateing if I had received the items. It was ordered and shipped on 23 Nov and as of 30 Nov I have not received anything. Finally received the batteries and they were exactly as described and they work great.  I would recommend this site to anyone.Upgraded from a 3 star to a 5 stsr.

Date of order: 7/24/2015 July 27, 2015 FREMONT, CA 94539                        OAKLAND, CA 94615  July 28, 2015 OAKLAND, CA 94615  - the package departed from facility The end. Today is 8/2/2015 and still haven't gotten an update on the package yet. (I know its Sunday but I've NEVER GONE 4 days without update). Very frustrating because I even called USPS but the lines were "busy" all the time. I actually do not know if it even left the facility.

Being as I go through so many C batteries and they are sometimes harder to find, I thought I'b buy some rechargeable C batteries. I got the batteries and the charger and charged them up. The charger is nice and works fine, but the batteries drain too fast in my trail cam. I thought being NI-MH, they would last a bit longer.

I ordered the products 1-2 days before Christmas and paid for the next day air shipping.  After checkout I observed the message orders take 1-3 business days to process.  My order did not process until the 28th, 4 days after my order and it did not arrive until the 30th.  Waste of money.  I ordered products from Amazon the same day with next day air shipping and they arrived the next day before Christmas.  I have not tested the products so my review is of order processing and shipping.

I bought the 5 in 1 cell meter specifically to test IR as listed. The readings for IR on this tester are pretty much useless and do not match the real readings from a good charger. I emailed all battery but have never heard back. So basically I have yest another regular volt checker. With shipping I just wasted $17.00

I have ordered li-ion batteries several times for my customers.  Deliverieshave been pretty fast is the past, but the last 3 times whey were SLOW.When I called All Battery they have said the batteries were not assembled and that would take several days.  They all ways print the UPS shipping label as soon as they receive your order, but don't actually ship until severaldays later.   I like their batteries and hope they can improve delivery.   It makes it hard for me to quote a delivery for my customers.

I ordered a combo pack 12 AA and 12 AAA. Well last thursday I only received 12 AA I contacted right away to let them know I only got half my order. It;s monday and I still waiting. This has been the only time I've had any issues with them. I've been shopping with them for over a year now maybe two.

Review.Titre: 5 for service - 1 for back order handling
Review.Contenu: Customer service was outstanding.  However, you guys let me order something and then to tell me 4 days later it's on back order for 6 weeks ONLY after I called because I saw the UPS package didn't ship out yet for my 2-day shipping! Need to be more proactive with back order statuses and information.

had a little trouble with the website, and getting a discount - customer service chat person was VERY helpful - finally got order placed....only to find out two days later is was cancelled (not in stock) - otherwise product is wonderful and reasonable. The order cancelled would have been our 3rd placed.

Review.Titre: Happy with Products & Shipping....Not Happy with Returns Experience!
Review.Contenu: Have ordered several times with All Batteries.   Very satisfied with what I've purchased and timeliness of receiving product.   However, 1 item recently purchased had a broken part; requested Return authorization and still have not received what I need to return this part.  Not happy about that!

The web page is a little difficult to navigate.I tried ordering online with no luck. The website is a little difficult to navigate. A customer service rep ...Andrew G...did a great job of getting me the batteries I needed. The batteries arrived in a satisfactory time frame. Not Andrews fault but the batteries were shipped in a box that was put in a envelope which was crushed by the UPS company. I can still use the batteries even though they were bent up pretty bad. All in all I would buy from the company again.

Review.Titre: Its been a week since my order was…
Review.Contenu: Its been a week since my order was placed. I did get a notification on sending me a tracking number when it ships but nothing since. I haven't received any notification on when it will ship. I'm anxious to receive my order. I'm disappointed with why its taking so long.

Review.Titre: Tenergy 438 Battery Charger lack of sufficient instructions
Review.Contenu: I purchased a Tenergy 438 Battery charger.  I have only had a 2 day experience with charging both AA & AAA Tenergy Batteries, but the instructions are insufficient.  The charger is very simple but final charging indications are not clear.  Also, if someone is not familiar with NiMh characteristics, there is no information. Also, a Plug with Cord comes with the Charger (and that is nice) with no mention at all.  I intend to discuss some more detailed points with All Battery and with Tenergy design personnel within the next few days.

My order of Tenergy rechargeable batteries and charger arrived pretty fast.....in just 4 days so that was great!  But when I installed the 4 batteries into  my Arlo Camera the charge was only 26% full.....you would think if it was new batteries the charge would be full power 100%....somehow I don't feel that's right...but after charging the batteries up my camera went to 96% which is acceptable to me......so all in all..that's why my rating is 3...it would have been 5 if the batteries went up to 100% right from the start without having to charge up....

Review.Titre: The battery packs I bought seem to be okay, but the product support and documentation is lacking.
Review.Contenu: The battery packs I bought seem to be good, but the charger only worked to charge each battery one time.  After that, it doesn't do anything except the start-up blinking.  The support for the product is less than minimal.  I am an electrical engineer with 36 years experience and the help they gave didn't help at all.  I finally just purchased 2 more units with the hope for better results.  If they work about the same I will abandon Tenergy as a source.  This rating is for the battery pack.  May be a good product, but lousy support.  I would give much higher if the support was better.

Review.Titre: I don't like that you create a shipping …
Review.Contenu: I don't like that you create a shipping label before the items are ready to ship.  A shipping label was created on the 16 th and it is now 6 days later and it still has not shipped.  If one item is holding the shipping up then call/ email asking if I would like split shipping.

I placed an order for a 14.8v 4400mAh battery pack and only was made aware that this is an "AP" (apparently meaning assembly required) item after purchasing. All-battery.com was eager to send me tracking info shortly after my confirmation, only to have it remain in the "Ready for UPS" status ever since. It's been 8 days and counting and the tracking is still "Ready for UPS". I'm not entirely dissatisfied, but all-battery.com wanted to me leave a review for them; before I receive my order? So this is what they get.

I all very pleased with the battery and the service I received.I have tried several times to order a second battery for a friend and can't get it ordered. I keep getting told my password is incorrect and I will be getting a email that doesn't come.    HELPTom Mays

Review.Titre: Haven't received my battery yet as I'm …
Review.Contenu: Haven't received my battery yet as I'm am using it for a replacement for my Marshall Kilburn Bluetooth speaker.  Shipping is taking a little longer than expected but that would be fine if I receive exactly what I order. Let's keep our fingers crossed

Review.Titre: I would give them another chance
Review.Contenu: Price and delivery times were both excellent. The quality of the batteries, however, was inconsistent.  While the AA and AAA were both fine, the 9-volt battery registered as nearly dead. It could have just been a random mistake. If it happens again, I would get upset.

Everything was great,the products I needed, the ease of ordering.One problem.  One hour after I completed my order, I received an e-mail offering a 10% discount if I completed my order which I already had done.What's up with that.

To be fair, I had to wait to respond to this review. I ordered two batteries for my helicopter with the hopes that they would arrive before it did. I got the batteries in three days but they were the wrong ones! It took a day before I got a RMA . I was told I would receive a refund after they received the wrong batteries back and that I would have to reorder to get the batteries I want. My helicopter, my charger, transmitter are all here ... but no batteries! I finally got the refund but I don't want to go through that again! It is a shame because they had the best price for a quality battery!

Will order from Tenergy again. The provided shipping options were incorrect for shipping batteries so shipment was delayed. I got credited for the lower cost of ground shipping but had to pay brokerage fees.

I always liked ordering from your company, and the big reason was because I would receive my order in two or three days. This order I've been waiting a week so far and still haven't received it, maybe it will come today.  Thank You for listening,  Larry

Review.Titre: The batteries are priced well but the shipping cost is outrageous.
Review.Contenu: The batteries are priced well but the shipping cost is outrageous. I would have purchased over $70 worth of batteries except the shipping charges were in the $30 range. For that reason, I just ordered what I couldn't get in the store.

Review.Titre: Batteries are just way too expensive
Review.Contenu: Batteries are just way too expensive, especially because they don't last long, unless you put the cameras in an inconspicuous place where they get no action.  Otherwise, they just get eaten up way too fast.

Review.Titre: Recent order of Centra  batteries and…
Review.Contenu: Recent order of Centra  batteries and charger No problem with batteries or charger, but I feel the charger should come with better instructions on diagnosing battery problems and what to expect when using REFRESH

Review.Titre: Amazing that I was charged close to …
Review.Contenu: Amazing that I was charged close to $15.00 for shipping and it has taken forever. Now I am being to review my experience and I still don't have my order. So I you order, be aware that it takes forever and they charged you a unbelievable fee.

Review.Titre: five of the batteries did not power on…
Review.Contenu: five of the batteries did not power on anything I tried them out in one that was working and they did not power up the lights so I put them in the sun and it still did not work other than that they were fine

I don't even have the batteries yet, so sort of tough to do a review on the service.  They won't even be here for another day or so.  They might want to hold off on asking for the service review till I actually have the product.

The batteries I found and ordered were exactly what I needed, and they arrived quickly and in good shape.  My problem is with your business model forcing me to purchase more than what I wanted (minimum order of $12) when I simply wanted about $9 worth.  No one else I have dealt with has a minimum purchase quantity, although when a $2 purchase has a shipping charge of $7 to ship (Like Radio Shack), I don't make a purchase.  The only reason I made this purchase is that I couldn't easily find these specific batteries (high capacity Nicad) in other places without fear of getting a small capacity battery in a larger nearly empty case.

Liked the product, but the batteries only lasted a year. Out of 12 batteries only two are still working. And the newest set I ordered still have not come in even though it was supposed to be here yesterday and haven't came in today either.

I have been buying batteries from All-Battery for many years.The NIMH batteries are excellent and the prices are very fair.The delivery is prompt.Now that they use USPS priority mail I expected their shipping price to be reasonable but I feel that charging $11.45 for shipping 13 sub C NIMHbatteries in a USPS flat rate envelope that retails for $4.95 is punitive.I love their products but for a company to make extra profit on shipping is not right.I know they will claim part of the charge is "handling", is no excuse.      This is my opinion and I'm sure others feel the same way and no longer do business with All-Battery.

It's frustrating to use, my last two orders it took over six tries each, I was locked out each time for some unspecified period. If it actually remembered the correct address from the last time I ordered perhaps it would be fine but still I had to go through it all again without knowing which parameter was the problem.

It was after 90days, so they wouldn't do an exchange, but after scanning the manual looking for the screen display, the warranty and service section shows 1 YEAR.  So Monday will be a support call, You should have waited a few days to ask for the review. Thanks, let's get it working!!!

Review.Titre: Actual mAH are 70% to 80% of stated values on 4 battery types I bought
Review.Contenu: Except for the overly optimistic Amp Hr ratings the batteries worked good.AAA 1000mAh Tenergy Premium NiMH cells had 710mAH @ 300ma.AA 2500mAh Tenergy Premium NiMH cells had 1950mAH @ 300ma.Sub C 2200mAh NiCd  Tenergy cells where 1850 mAH at 300ma load. Tenergy SideKick Storm Kit Portable LiFePO4 Power Bank rated at 13600mAH capacity  was 9400mAh. (using four 2.3 AHr 3.2V cells.) This provided only 2.3 AHr on the 12V output at 4A load.This is enough to charge my small laptop about 25% using the 19V output.The 12V jumper output provided about 200 CCA for 30 sec total, in 5 sec burst. Probable not enough to start 30 cars as stated but at least good enough for more than one quick starts.

Shipment was short of product ordered. Have always recived products with out incident.  Still working on tryng to recover missing items.  Everything else was great.  Shipping needs to be a little more acceptable.

Review.Titre: Great product after a rough start.
Review.Contenu: The first unit I received was dead-on-arrival, so I can't give 5 stars. When I reached out for support and warranty replacement, it took around a month to resolve the situation. In normal circumstances I would think this was unreasonably slow. However, this process was happening in the midst of COVID shutdowns, so I'm inclined to give the benefit of the doubt on slow response times. I will say that each response was good - they had good attitudes, asked the right questions, and ultimately did send me a replacement unit. That unit works perfectly and offers great controls and flexibility. Aside from the delays, the product and the support have been great. I'm very happy now (even if I was a little disgruntled for several weeks in the middle there!)

Review.Titre: Quality product from a quality company
Top products and fantastic customer care
Review.Contenu: ‘Have been using Tenergy Power rechargeable batteries for some ten years now and will never look back. Measured capacity is always higher than stated, internal resistance is low, and they stay healthy longer than the competition in my experience. Tenergy also offers a wide range of characteristics for any given size. Only top manufacturers can achieve this because it takes research, dedication, and a variety of manufacturing methods.The same applies to Tenergy's range of chargers. I now use the TN456 because it's superior in every way to the brand name unit I had before. (You can find my rave review of it on Amazon.)What sets Tenergy apart as well is how they treat us. Several times it was a very senior engineer who answered my detailed questions in a delightful email dialogue. How rare is that in a world where chatbots and canned replies have taken over?Summing up, Tenergy Power cares about its products, its customers, and its reputation. You will be very pleased.

Review.Titre: Customised and delivered ahead of time
Review.Contenu: I am a visitor to the USA and needed a battery pack before my imminent depart. It had to be made to order. The Tenergy team patiently (and relentlessly) made sure they got all the necessary specs from me. Finally, they delivered a better product than I expected, more adapted to my need. We also worked out shipping, that was cost effective and delivered to me well ahead of my deadline. I preferred the product to one available at less than half right price, as it was US made, and I didn't want a possible drop in quality.

Review.Contenu: I am so impressed with Tenergy's products. I ordered a charger and some batteries a while ago, and they last a LONG time, so I just ordered some more!! Their shipping, ordering, etc. is very efficient, and their customer service is top-notch. Nice job, Tenergy.

Review.Contenu: I have purchased Tenergy batteries for several years now, both for home and work.  We find that they are just as good as the name brands, which cost way more.  I would highly recommend trying them for all your battery needs!

Review.Titre: Easy to find the type of replacement batteries I need
Review.Contenu: Easy to find the type of replacement batteries I need for my alarm system sensors.  My alarm system technician uses the same Tenergy batteries I purchased; they last a really long time; and they fit perfectly in my sensor units. Since I live in a rural area, no one near me carries the exact type I need to replace the original batteries.  Plus, I was not only able to find the type I need, but I was also able to select the quantity I wanted--from only 1 on up. I opted for the 16-count package, since most of my sensors are close to needing battery replacements. I appreciate that Tenergy sells to individuals. Check out was easy.  Shipping was prompt.  I will definitely look to Tenergy first for my battery needs going forward.

Review.Titre: My old cordless screwdriver lives again!
Review.Contenu: I bought this cordless screwdriver, Blue-point model# ETBSL365 many years ago from the tool truck and it saw limited duty and eventually ended up in my tool locker at work. I found it in there covered in dust and 3 dead NiCDs in it. After a quick interweb search I found Tenergy Power and they had a slightly better version of the original batteries, in stock, so I ordered them on a Friday... and received them on Monday. The solder tab 4/5ths C cells are an exact fit, a few mAhs bigger and had the option of solder tabs. The tabs made the refurb installation a breeze. I plan to actually use the tool this time around, thank you Tenergy Power for the super fast service and great quality batteries.

I have been using Tenergy Rechargeable AAA batteries exclusively, ever since I found them at Fry's Dallas location. I still have my Tenergy TN160 12 slot AA/AAA battery charger and I use it everyday! Tenergy Rechargeable AAA batteries have saved me about $1000 a year by recharging vs buying a 20 pack of conventional Alkaline batteries every week for $20.00 a pop! I'm service tech that works on commercial coffee equipment, combination fountain drink/ice maker equipment, etc., for a very large convenience store corporation. I don't use my flashlight occasionally, I actually carry two, with freshly charged Tenergy AAA batteries in both. Do the math! A 20 pack of Alkaline batteries is now over $22, so $22 x 52 weeks = $1144 a year, just for freakin' batteries so I can do my job! And on top of that, figure the carbon footprint for all of those batteries going into a landfill! Our beloved parents did not understand how they were polluting our land and water. All they cared about was making their fortune by stripping all the natural resources, then dumping all of their pollution back into the environment. They even said that the effects of pollution are nothing but lies, dreamed up liberal Left Wing radical hippies. It's all a lie they said! I dare them to say it now. Any way you look at it, rechargeable batteries by Tenergy outlast, out perform, are better for our environment and just make good sense for your wallet!
